title: Building The Boring Blog
subtitle: The Reason Behide This Blog
text:
Hello World.
That was used way to much in the development of this blog. The point of this is to allow me to talk about my coding life a little more, to help you out with issues I may have solved and to let me vent about my own coding issues. Enjoy.

~kgsensei

title: Nothing Here
subtitle: Nothing Here

title: Why Does This Blog Exist?
subtitle: Talking about why the Boring Blog exists...
text:
The reason the Boring Blog exists is simple, one of my friends Daniel Kellem [GitHub] started a blog called TECHNOSTOLOGY and I felt inspired. A few months later I was sitting at my desk trying to think of a new project to work on. That's when it hit me. As if the world didn't have enough blogs already, I would build my own blog. The only difference is that I would code mine from the ground up. So I started work. A day or two later and countless changes to the code we have a working blog service where all the blog posts and data are controlled by a single file. As an added bonus its 100% open source.
-kgsensei [Jeremy]
